phrs.translation: 心房中隔缺损；心房间隔缺损

sentences.sentence: When an arterial switch is impossible, an atrial switch will be attempted using either the Senning or Mustard procedure.
sentences.translation: 当无法进行动脉切换时，将使用森宁或马斯塔德程序尝试进行心房切换。

sentences.sentence: Atrial natriuretic peptide(ANP) plays an important role in the regulation of blood pressure through sodium-water homoeostasis.
sentences.translation: 心钠素通过水盐代谢平衡在调节血压中起重要作用。

sentences.sentence: He was suffering from atrial fibrillation, the most common form of heart rhythm problem.
sentences.translation: 他患有最常见的心率问题：房颤症。
